description:
https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/compute/?expanded=create-server-detail#create-server

In " Create Server" API, 'flavorRef' parameter is defined as follows:

> The flavor reference, as a UUID or full URL, for the flavor for your server instance.

But The flavor ID can be specified as not only a UUID but only any string or integer.
So the description should be fixed.
title: api-ref: wrong description for 'flavorRef' parameter in Create Server API
